snippet: At the first Wall Street Training Valuation Case Competition, 25 teams of elite business students and undergraduates competed to be top Wall Street deal makers.
abstract: At the first Wall Street Training Valuation Case Competition, 25 teams of elite business students and undergraduates competed to be top Wall Street deal makers.
lead_paragraph: Late last week, in a shadowy Manhattan boardroom, 16 deal makers gathered to lay the groundwork for multibillion-dollar deals that would move the markets - if only they were real.

headline.main: For This College Sport, the Playing Field Is a Boardroom

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
